name: Sledcoaster 64
description:
A/D to turn sled

If you fall off or wack a tree just hit the reset button :)

Apologies for the lack of polish: we're pulling this release together on very little sleep and the last of the coffee beans. Our original intention was infinite procedural generation of the hill, unfortunately we ran into some showstopper bugs in Godot multithreading that made the executable unstable and just couldn't be resolved in time despite a heroic effort.

Credit to CosmicGem for the stellar OST

Crossover snowman inspired by Goodgis's stream after being surprised by our suspiciously similar inspirations.
